## How to use this reporting guideline {#how-to-use}

You can use <span class="defined" data-bs-toggle="offcanvas" href="#reportingGuidelines" aria-controls="offcanvasExample" role="button">reporting guidelines</span> throughout your research process. 

* When writing: Consider using a [writing guide](#downloads) to draft your manuscript or protocol.
* After writing: Complete a [checklist](#downloads) and include it with your journal submission.
* To learn: Consult the [guidance](#summary) whenever you need it.

Please [cite](#citation) SRQR, however you use it.
